name: SpaceBar (Broxly)
description:
SpaceBar is a stylish, fun to play endless fps shooter and platformer game... In each level there is amount of drones you have to kill while you are running as you can tell...

There is some factors that makes things harder except drones, there is lazers, lava and limited ammo which is things you should be careful about them. Also game has a simple tutorial section that you can see all the keys to play SpaceBar.

SpaceBar's current version is  Alpha 1.0  so i would be very happy to read your comments and suggestions...
